measured_by: Variance of cosine-similarity scores of Universal Sentence Encoder embeddings across all idea pairs
justification: "Idea submissions from a single discussion are transcribed and analyzed to compute the ideas' semantic variance… we embed submitted ideas using the Universal Sentence Encoder … the final idea diversity score is computed as the variance of semantic similarity score across all pairs."

measured_by: Polarization score based on absolute difference in Republican vs. Democrat voting proportions
justification: "For each idea submitted, we computed a polarization score based on the fraction of Republicans and Democrats who voted for the idea… P_i = |(p_rep /(p_rep + p_dem)) - 0.5| * 2."

measured_by: Collaborative filtering predictions of participant-idea voting patterns
justification: "Similarity between ideas is also assessed using collaborative filtering… used here to infer the votes that a participant i would have given to idea j had they encountered it during the discussion."
